Articles.Content:
i just got the (older) Deep-Space Missions pack, and decided to toy around with it, like I typically do during the first time I run the game with new parts. I happened to make a SSTO-capable Ion engine propelled craft. the only catch: It only is SSTO during the day. Includes landing gear, but be careful! the strength of the battery-engine link is not the best.

Edited August 23, 2012 by MaverickSawyer
Update of info
Tip: If you put screenshots in your posts, people will be more likely to comment and download your file
Please add screenshots or a video, I, and I know many others, would like to see it before downloading
screenshots or bust dude, screenshots or bust.
can you make some screenshots plz?
I tried to be helpfull and make pics, but it also requires a mod I don't have, tell us what it is!
Also I am apparently lacking reading comprehension and I cant edit my own posts so, sorry I know the mod.. derp..

Jett, you'll be able to edit and upload pics as soon as you reach 5 posts and the upgrader script notices you, it's best to upload files to 3rd part sites though and link them here, as everyone only gets 20mb of storage here.

Pastebin is good for text files, while Mediafire can handle mods, and Imgur is great for pics
Yeah, the DSM ion engine is waaaay to powerful. The thrust value should be 10 at most, nowhere near 50.

Thank you. I left the thread unattended for a while and spaced (pun intended) on the screenies. Sorry.

As for video, any suggestions for which ones work best?
i am not sure how, but you can embed videos.

Yeah, the DSM ion engine is waaaay to powerful. The thrust value should be 10 at most, nowhere near 50.

Unless this was posted before a change i don't see how the engine is to powerful. It has 50 thrust and between the battery and the engine it has a mass of 7, giving a thrust to weight of 0.71. I tried building a Ion only ship and couldn't get it off the ground. Even with the lightest pod, five ion engines and just one battery, still only had a thrust to weight of about .9.

Anywho, this craft file didn't work for me. So I think he must have removed some of the parts or something.

Unless this was posted before a change i don't see how the engine is to powerful. It has 50 thrust and between the battery and the engine it has a mass of 7, giving a thrust to weight of 0.71. I tried building a Ion only ship and couldn't get it off the ground. Even with the lightest pod, five ion engines and just one battery, still only had a thrust to weight of about .9.

Anywho, this craft file didn't work for me. So I think he must have removed some of the parts or something.

This used the non-0.16 updated version. I'll go back and edit the title and OP to address this.
